statusLine.command: h=$(hostname -s); d=$(pwd); d=${d/#$HOME/\~}; IFS='/' read -ra P <<< "$d"; c=${#P[@]}; [ $c -le 2 ] && dd="$d" || dd=".../${P[$((c-2))]}/${P[$((c-1))]}"; g=""; if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then b=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); [[ "$b" == *"/"* ]] && b=$(basename "$b"); b=$(printf "%.12s" "$b"); if git --no-optional-locks diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && git --no-optional-locks diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then ab=$(git rev-list --left-right --count @{u}...HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo "0 0"); bh=$(echo "$ab" | awk '{print $1}'); ah=$(echo "$ab" | awk '{print $2}'); [ "$bh" -gt 0 ] && [ "$ah" -gt 0 ] && gc="\033[31m" || { [ "$bh" -gt 0 ] || [ "$ah" -gt 0 ]; } && gc="\033[37m" || gc="\033[32m"; else gc="\033[33m"; fi; g=$(printf "${gc}%s\033[0m " "$b"); fi; printf "\033[1m%s\033[0m %s%s" "$h" "$g" "$dd"
